content:
# The error indicates that I no longer have any iron ore in my inventory to insert into the new furnace for smelting. This is likely because I had previously used it all for crafting or other operations.

# To continue, I will need to gather more iron ore from the nearest iron ore patch. 

# Let's find the nearest iron ore resource patch and harvest some iron ore.
iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore patch
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the iron ore position
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest some iron ore

# After harvesting the iron ore, I will check the updated inventory.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after harvesting iron ore.
